lessons.title: 1. Sızma Testi Temelleri ve Metodolojiler
lessons.description: Sızma testi kavramlarını öğren, metodolojileri keşfet ve profesyonel sızma testi süreçlerini anla.

pages.title: Sızma Testi Nedir?
pages.content:
Sızma testi (Penetration Testing), sistemlerin güvenlik açıklarını tespit etmek için yapılan kontrollü saldırı simülasyonlarıdır.

🎯 **Sızma Testinin Amacı:**
• Güvenlik açıklarını proaktif olarak tespit etmek
• Sistemlerin gerçek saldırılara karşı direncini test etmek
• Güvenlik önlemlerinin etkinliğini değerlendirmek
• Yasal ve etik kurallar çerçevesinde güvenlik testleri yapmak
• Güvenlik raporları hazırlayarak iyileştirme önerileri sunmak

🔍 **Sızma Testi Türleri:**
• **Black Box Testing:** Dışarıdan saldırı simülasyonu
• **White Box Testing:** İç bilgilerle tam erişim testi
• **Gray Box Testing:** Sınırlı bilgiyle hibrit test
• **External Testing:** Dış ağdan saldırı testi
• **Internal Testing:** İç ağdan saldırı testi
• **Web Application Testing:** Web uygulama güvenlik testi
• **Mobile Application Testing:** Mobil uygulama testi
• **Social Engineering Testing:** Sosyal mühendislik testi

⚖️ **Yasal ve Etik Kurallar:**
• Yazılı izin alınması zorunludur
• Test kapsamı ve sınırları belirlenmelidir
• Gizlilik anlaşması imzalanmalıdır
• Test sonuçları güvenli şekilde saklanmalıdır
• Etik kurallara uygun davranılmalıdır

pages.title: Sızma Testi Metodolojileri
pages.content:
Profesyonel sızma testleri, standart metodolojiler kullanılarak yapılır.

📋 **OWASP Testing Guide:**
• Web uygulama güvenlik testleri için
• 4 ana aşama: Planning, Discovery, Testing, Reporting
• Detaylı test prosedürleri
• Güvenlik açığı kategorileri

🔧 **PTES (Penetration Testing Execution Standard):**
• 7 ana aşama:
  1. Pre-engagement Interactions
  2. Intelligence Gathering
  3. Threat Modeling
  4. Vulnerability Assessment
  5. Exploitation
  6. Post Exploitation
  7. Reporting

🛡️ **NIST SP 800-115:**
• Federal bilgi sistemleri için
• 4 aşama: Planning, Discovery, Attack, Reporting
• Risk değerlendirme odaklı
• Compliance gereksinimleri

🎯 **OSSTMM (Open Source Security Testing Methodology Manual):**
• Açık kaynak metodoloji
• 5 ana alan: Human, Physical, Wireless, Telecommunications, Data Networks
• Operasyonel güvenlik testleri
• Metrik tabanlı değerlendirme

⚡ **PTES vs OWASP Karşılaştırması:**
• PTES: Genel sızma testleri
• OWASP: Web uygulama odaklı
• Her ikisi de profesyonel standartlar
• Proje türüne göre seçim yapılır

pages.title: Sızma Testi Aşamaları
pages.content:
Profesyonel bir sızma testi, sistematik aşamalardan oluşur.

📝 **1. Pre-engagement (Ön Hazırlık):**
• Test kapsamının belirlenmesi
• Yasal izinlerin alınması
• Test ekibinin oluşturulması
• Test ortamının hazırlanması
• Gizlilik anlaşmalarının imzalanması
• Test zamanlamasının planlanması

🔍 **2. Reconnaissance (Keşif):**
• Passive information gathering
• Active information gathering
• Network discovery
• Service enumeration
• Technology stack identification
• Vulnerability research

🎯 **3. Vulnerability Assessment:**
• Automated vulnerability scanning
• Manual vulnerability testing
• Configuration review
• Security control assessment
• Risk prioritization
• False positive elimination

⚔️ **4. Exploitation:**
• Vulnerability exploitation
• Privilege escalation
• Lateral movement
• Data exfiltration
• Persistence establishment
• Impact assessment

📊 **5. Post-Exploitation:**
• System access maintenance
• Additional system discovery
• Data collection
• Evidence gathering
• Cleanup operations
• Impact documentation

📋 **6. Reporting:**
• Executive summary
• Technical findings
• Risk assessment
• Remediation recommendations
• Timeline and effort estimates
• Follow-up procedures

pages.title: Sızma Testi Araçları ve Framework'leri
pages.content:
Sızma testi uzmanları, çeşitli araçlar ve framework'ler kullanır.

🛠️ **Reconnaissance Araçları:**
• **Nmap:** Network discovery ve port scanning
• **Recon-ng:** Web reconnaissance framework
• **theHarvester:** Email ve subdomain discovery
• **Sublist3r:** Subdomain enumeration
• **Shodan:** Internet-connected device search
• **Censys:** Internet scanning platform

🔍 **Vulnerability Scanners:**
• **Nessus:** Commercial vulnerability scanner
• **OpenVAS:** Open source vulnerability scanner
• **Nexpose:** Rapid7 vulnerability management
• **Qualys VMDR:** Cloud-based vulnerability management
• **Burp Suite:** Web application security testing
• **OWASP ZAP:** Free web application scanner

⚔️ **Exploitation Frameworks:**
• **Metasploit:** Penetration testing framework
• **Cobalt Strike:** Red team operations platform
• **Empire:** PowerShell post-exploitation framework
• **Impacket:** Network protocol library
• **PowerSploit:** PowerShell exploitation toolkit
• **BloodHound:** Active Directory attack path analysis

🌐 **Web Application Testing:**
• **Burp Suite Professional:** Comprehensive web testing
• **OWASP ZAP:** Free web application scanner
• **SQLMap:** SQL injection testing
• **XSSer:** Cross-site scripting testing
• **Wfuzz:** Web application fuzzer
• **Nikto:** Web server scanner

📱 **Mobile Testing:**
• **MobSF:** Mobile security framework
• **Frida:** Dynamic instrumentation toolkit
• **Objection:** Runtime mobile exploration
• **APKTool:** Android reverse engineering
• **ClassyShark:** Android APK analyzer
• **Drozer:** Android security assessment

🔧 **Network Testing:**
• **Wireshark:** Network protocol analyzer
• **tcpdump:** Command-line packet analyzer
• **Ettercap:** Network security tool
• **Responder:** LLMNR/NBT-NS poisoner
• **Impacket:** Network protocol library
• **CrackMapExec:** Active Directory testing

pages.title: Sızma Testi Raporlama
pages.content:
Sızma testi raporu, testin en kritik aşamasıdır.

📋 **Rapor Yapısı:**
• **Executive Summary:** Yöneticiler için özet
• **Technical Summary:** Teknik detaylar
• **Methodology:** Kullanılan metodoloji
• **Findings:** Bulunan güvenlik açıkları
• **Risk Assessment:** Risk değerlendirmesi
• **Recommendations:** Öneriler ve çözümler
• **Appendices:** Teknik detaylar ve loglar

🎯 **Executive Summary İçeriği:**
• Test kapsamı ve hedefleri
• Genel güvenlik durumu
• Kritik bulgular
• Risk seviyeleri
• Acil aksiyon gereken konular
• Genel değerlendirme

🔍 **Technical Findings Formatı:**
• **Vulnerability Title:** Açık başlığı
• **Risk Level:** Kritik/Yüksek/Orta/Düşük
• **CVSS Score:** Common Vulnerability Scoring System
• **Description:** Açığın açıklaması
• **Impact:** Etki analizi
• **Proof of Concept:** İspat kodu/komutları
• **Remediation:** Çözüm önerileri
• **References:** Kaynaklar ve referanslar

📊 **Risk Assessment Kriterleri:**
• **Likelihood:** Olasılık (Yüksek/Orta/Düşük)
• **Impact:** Etki (Yüksek/Orta/Düşük)
• **Business Risk:** İş riski değerlendirmesi
• **Compliance Impact:** Uyumluluk etkisi
• **Remediation Effort:** Çözüm çabası

💡 **Etkili Raporlama İpuçları:**
• Açık ve anlaşılır dil kullanın
• Görsel öğeler ekleyin (screenshots, diyagramlar)
• Öncelik sıralaması yapın
• Somut çözüm önerileri sunun
• Teknik ve yönetici seviyesi için ayrı bölümler
• Follow-up planı hazırlayın

pages.title: Quiz: Sızma Testi Temelleri
pages.question: Sızma testi metodolojilerinden hangisi web uygulama güvenlik testleri için özellikle tasarlanmıştır?
pages.explanation: OWASP Testing Guide, web uygulama güvenlik testleri için özellikle tasarlanmış bir metodolojidir. Web uygulamalarındaki güvenlik açıklarını tespit etmek için detaylı prosedürler ve test teknikleri sunar.

lessons.title: 2. Reconnaissance ve Bilgi Toplama
lessons.description: Reconnaissance tekniklerini öğren, passive ve active bilgi toplama yöntemlerini keşfet.

pages.title: Reconnaissance Nedir? Temel Kavramlar
pages.content:
Reconnaissance (Keşif), sızma testinin ilk ve en kritik aşamasıdır. Bu aşamada hedef hakkında mümkün olduğunca çok bilgi toplanır.

🎯 **Reconnaissance'ın Amacı:**
• Hedef organizasyon hakkında detaylı bilgi toplama
• Saldırı yüzeyini belirleme
• Potansiyel güvenlik açıklarını tespit etme
• Sosyal mühendislik için bilgi edinme
• Test stratejisi oluşturma

📊 **İstatistikler:**
• Reconnaissance, sızma testinin %80'ini oluşturur
• İyi yapılmış keşif, test başarısını %70 artırır
• Profesyonel saldırganlar ortalama 206 gün keşif yapar
• OSINT kaynakları %90 oranında faydalı bilgi sağlar

⚖️ **Yasal ve Etik Kurallar:**
• Yazılı izin kapsamında kalınmalıdır
• Aggressive scanning yapmaktan kaçınılmalıdır
• Üçüncü taraf sistemlere saldırılmamalıdır
• Toplanan bilgiler gizli tutulmalıdır
• Reconnaissance sınırları belirlenmeli

🔍 **Reconnaissance Türleri:**
• **Passive Reconnaissance:** Hedef sistemle doğrudan iletişim kurulmaz
• **Active Reconnaissance:** Hedef sistemle doğrudan iletişim kurulur
• **Physical Reconnaissance:** Fiziksel lokasyon keşfi
• **Social Reconnaissance:** İnsan faktörü keşfi

pages.title: Passive Reconnaissance Teknikleri
pages.content:
Passive Reconnaissance, hedef sistemle doğrudan temas kurmadan bilgi toplama sürecidir.

🌐 **OSINT (Open Source Intelligence):**
• **Arama Motorları:**
  - Google Dorking teknikleri
  - Bing, DuckDuckGo, Yandex
  - Shodan, Censys, ZoomEye
  - Archive.org (Wayback Machine)

• **Sosyal Medya İstihbaratı:**
  - LinkedIn (çalışan profilleri)
  - Facebook, Twitter, Instagram
  - Professional networks
  - Company pages ve posts

• **DNS Bilgi Toplama:**
  - Whois kayıtları
  - DNS zone transfers
  - Subdomain enumeration
  - Reverse DNS lookups

📋 **Pasif Bilgi Kaynakları:**
• **Şirket Web Siteleri:**
  - Çalışan bilgileri
  - Organizasyon şeması
  - Kullanılan teknolojiler
  - İletişim bilgileri
  - İş ilanları (teknoloji stack)

• **Haber ve Basın:**
  - Şirket haberleri
  - Teknoloji değişimleri
  - Proje duyuruları
  - Executive interviews

🛠️ **Passive Reconnaissance Araçları:**
• **theHarvester:** Email, domain, IP bilgileri
• **Recon-ng:** Comprehensive OSINT framework
• **Maltego:** Visual link analysis
• **SpiderFoot:** Automated OSINT collection
• **Shodan:** Internet-connected device search
• **Censys:** Internet scan data
• **Google Dorking:** Advanced search operators

pages.title: Active Reconnaissance Teknikleri
pages.content:
Active Reconnaissance, hedef sistemle doğrudan iletişim kurarak bilgi toplama sürecidir.

🔍 **Network Discovery:**
• **Host Discovery:**
  - ICMP ping sweep
  - TCP SYN ping
  - UDP ping
  - ARP ping (local network)

• **Port Scanning:**
  - TCP Connect scan
  - TCP SYN scan (stealth)
  - UDP scan
  - FIN, NULL, Xmas scans
  - ACK scan (firewall evasion)

• **Service Enumeration:**
  - Banner grabbing
  - Version detection
  - OS fingerprinting
  - Service-specific probes

🛠️ **Active Reconnaissance Araçları:**
• **Nmap:** Network discovery ve port scanning
• **Masscan:** High-speed port scanner
• **Zmap:** Internet-wide scanning
• **Unicornscan:** Distributed port scanner
• **Hping3:** Custom packet crafting
• **Netcat:** Network Swiss Army knife
• **Telnet:** Banner grabbing
• **Netdiscover:** ARP reconnaissance

📊 **Service Enumeration Teknikleri:**
• **HTTP/HTTPS (80,443):**
  - Web server fingerprinting
  - Directory brute forcing
  - Technology stack detection
  - SSL certificate analysis

• **DNS (53):**
  - Zone transfer attempts
  - DNS brute forcing
  - Reverse lookups
  - DNS cache snooping

⚠️ **Active Keşif Riskleri:**
• IDS/IPS sistemleri tarafından tespit
• Log kayıtlarında iz bırakma
• Network traffic artışı
• Service disruption riski
• Legal implications

pages.title: Web Application Reconnaissance
pages.content:
Web uygulamaları için özel reconnaissance teknikleri ve metodolojileri.

🌐 **Web Application Discovery:**
• **Technology Stack Identification:**
  - Web server detection (Apache, Nginx, IIS)
  - Framework identification (Laravel, Django, React)
  - Programming language detection
  - Database system analysis
  - Third-party integrations

• **Content Discovery:**
  - Directory brute forcing
  - File extension analysis
  - Hidden parameter discovery
  - API endpoint enumeration
  - Admin panel detection

🛠️ **Web Reconnaissance Araçları:**
• **Burp Suite:**
  - Proxy ve intercept
  - Spider/crawler
  - Content discovery
  - Parameter analysis

• **OWASP ZAP:**
  - Automated spidering
  - Passive scanning
  - Fuzzing capabilities
  - API testing

• **Dirb/Dirbuster:**
  - Directory brute forcing
  - File discovery
  - Extension testing
  - Custom wordlists

• **Gobuster:**
  - Fast directory brute forcing
  - DNS subdomain brute forcing
  - VHOST discovery
  - Multi-threaded scanning

📋 **Web Reconnaissance Checklist:**
• **Initial Assessment:**
  - Site map creation
  - Technology identification
  - SSL/TLS configuration
  - Security headers analysis

• **Content Analysis:**
  - robots.txt examination
  - sitemap.xml analysis
  - Source code review
  - Comment analysis
  - Meta tag inspection

pages.title: Social Engineering Reconnaissance
pages.content:
İnsan faktörü üzerinden bilgi toplama teknikleri ve sosyal mühendislik keşfi.

👥 **Personel Bilgi Toplama:**
• **LinkedIn Intelligence:**
  - Organizational chart mapping
  - Employee role analysis
  - Technology skills identification
  - Professional connections
  - Recent job changes

• **Social Media Analysis:**
  - Personal information gathering
  - Family and friend connections
  - Lifestyle and interests
  - Location and travel patterns
  - Security awareness level

🏢 **Organizational Intelligence:**
• **Company Structure:**
  - Management hierarchy
  - Department organization
  - Reporting relationships
  - Decision makers identification
  - Key personnel roles

• **Business Intelligence:**
  - Business partners
  - Vendor relationships
  - Client information
  - Project details
  - Financial information

🛠️ **Social Reconnaissance Araçları:**
• **theHarvester:**
  - Email address collection
  - Social media profiles
  - Employee enumeration
  - Contact information

• **Maltego:**
  - Relationship mapping
  - Social network analysis
  - Visual intelligence
  - Data correlation

• **Sherlock:**
  - Username enumeration
  - Social media presence
  - Account discovery
  - Platform analysis

pages.title: Physical Reconnaissance
pages.content:
Fiziksel güvenlik ve lokasyon keşfi teknikleri.

🏢 **Physical Location Assessment:**
• **Building Assessment:**
  - Entry/exit points mapping
  - Security camera locations
  - Guard post identification
  - Visitor procedures analysis
  - Badge/access card systems

• **Perimeter Security:**
  - Fence and barrier analysis
  - Lighting assessment
  - Motion sensors detection
  - Alarm systems observation
  - Vehicle access points

📷 **Surveillance Techniques:**
• **Visual Surveillance:**
  - Direct observation
  - Photography (legal areas)
  - Video recording
  - Timing analysis
  - Pattern identification

• **Technology Assessment:**
  - WiFi network discovery
  - Bluetooth device enumeration
  - RFID/NFC detection
  - Physical ports access
  - Network infrastructure visibility

🎯 **Information Gathering:**
• **Security Measures:**
  - Guard schedules
  - Patrol routes
  - Response procedures
  - Equipment types
  - Blind spots identification

• **Operational Information:**
  - Business hours
  - Peak activity times
  - Delivery schedules
  - Maintenance windows
  - Special events

⚖️ **Legal ve Ethical Boundaries:**
• **Legal Activities:**
  - Public area observation
  - Publicly available information
  - Legal photography
  - Open source intelligence

• **Illegal Activities:**
  - Trespassing on private property
  - Unauthorized access attempts
  - Privacy violations
  - Stalking or harassment
  - Equipment tampering

pages.title: Quiz: Reconnaissance ve Bilgi Toplama
pages.question: Passive Reconnaissance'ın temel avantajı nedir?
pages.explanation: Passive Reconnaissance'ın en büyük avantajı, hedef sistemle doğrudan temas kurulmadığı için tespit edilme riskinin minimum olmasıdır. Bu sayede gizli kalarak güvenli bir şekilde bilgi toplanabilir.

lessons.title: 3. Vulnerability Assessment ve Exploitation
lessons.description: Güvenlik açıklarını tespit et ve exploit et, Metasploit framework'ünü kullan.

pages.title: Vulnerability Assessment Nedir?
pages.content:
Vulnerability Assessment, sistemlerdeki güvenlik açıklarını tespit etme ve değerlendirme sürecidir.

🎯 Vulnerability Assessment Amaçları:
• Bilinen güvenlik açıklarını tespit etme
• Risk seviyelerini belirleme
• Güvenlik duruşunu değerlendirme
• Compliance gereksinimlerini karşılama
• Remediation önceliklerini belirleme

📊 Güvenlik Açığı Türleri:
• Configuration Vulnerabilities:
  - Default passwords
  - Unnecessary services
  - Weak encryption settings
  - Missing security patches

• Software Vulnerabilities:
  - Buffer overflows
  - SQL injection
  - Cross-site scripting (XSS)
  - Remote code execution

• Network Vulnerabilities:
  - Open ports
  - Weak protocols
  - Network segmentation issues
  - Firewall misconfigurations

🔍 Assessment Metodolojileri:
• OWASP Testing Guide:
  - Web application focus
  - Systematic approach
  - Detailed test cases
  - Risk rating system

• NIST SP 800-115:
  - Federal guidelines
  - Risk-based approach
  - Comprehensive coverage
  - Documentation standards

⚖️ Assessment Sınırları:
• Yasal Sınırlar:
  - Yetkili test kapsamı
  - Kapsam kısıtlamaları
  - Zaman sınırlamaları
  - Delil yönetim kuralları

• Teknik Sınırlar:
  - False positive sonuçlar
  - Anlık durum tespiti
  - Araç kısıtlamaları
  - Erişim kısıtlamaları

pages.title: Automated Vulnerability Scanning
pages.content:
Otomatik güvenlik açığı taraması, sistemleri hızlı ve kapsamlı şekilde değerlendirme yöntemidir.

🔍 Scanner Türleri:
• Network Vulnerability Scanners:
  - Nessus (Tenable)
  - OpenVAS (Açık kaynak)
  - Qualys VMDR
  - Rapid7 Nexpose
  - Nmap NSE scripts

• Web Application Scanners:
  - Burp Suite Professional
  - OWASP ZAP
  - Acunetix
  - Nikto
  - W3AF

• Database Scanners:
  - SQLMap
  - DBProtect
  - AppDetectivePRO
  - NGSSQuirreL

📈 Tarama Stratejileri:
• Comprehensive Scanning:
  - Tüm portları tarama
  - Detaylı service detection
  - Yoğun güvenlik testleri
  - Uzun süre alır

• Targeted Scanning:
  - Belirli servislere odaklanma
  - Bilinen port aralıkları
  - Hızlı değerlendirme
  - Kritik sistemler öncelikli

• Authenticated vs Unauthenticated:
  - Authenticated: Sistem içi erişim
  - Unauthenticated: Dışarıdan görünüm
  - Hibrit yaklaşım öneriliyor

⚠️ Tarama Riskleri ve Önlemler:
• Sistem Performansı:
  - CPU ve network yükü
  - Service interruption riski
  - Business hours dışında tarama
  - Throttling kullanımı

• False Positives:
  - Yanlış pozitif sonuçlar
  - Manual doğrulama gerekli
  - Filtreleme ve tuning
  - Baseline oluşturma

🛠️ Tarama Süreci:
1. Scope belirleme ve planlama
2. Tarama araçlarının konfigürasyonu
3. İlk tarama ve sonuç toplama
4. False positive elimination
5. Risk prioritization
6. Detailed manual verification
7. Remediation recommendations

pages.title: Exploitation Temelleri
pages.content:
Exploitation, tespit edilen güvenlik açıklarını kullanarak sistem erişimi sağlama sürecidir.

🎯 Exploitation Amaçları:
• Proof of Concept oluşturma
• Impact assessment yapma
• Risk seviyesini belirleme
• Business risk analizi
• Remediation önceliklerini belirleme

⚔️ Exploitation Türleri:
• Remote Code Execution (RCE):
  - Command injection
  - File upload vulnerabilities
  - Deserialization attacks
  - Template injection

• Privilege Escalation:
  - Local privilege escalation
  - Kernel exploits
  - Service misconfigurations
  - SUID binary exploits

• Memory Corruption:
  - Buffer overflow
  - Stack overflow
  - Heap overflow
  - Use-after-free

🛡️ Exploit Development Süreci:
1. Vulnerability Analysis:
   - Root cause analysis
   - Attack vector identification
   - Exploitation feasibility
   - Environment constraints

2. Proof of Concept Development:
   - Minimal working exploit
   - Reliability testing
   - Cross-platform compatibility
   - Payload customization

3. Weaponization:
   - Stealth techniques
   - Anti-forensics measures
   - Persistence mechanisms
   - Evasion techniques

🔍 Exploitation Araçları:
• Framework'ler:
  - Metasploit Framework
  - Cobalt Strike
  - Empire Framework
  - PoshC2

• Custom Tools:
  - Python exploit scripts
  - C/C++ exploits
  - PowerShell payloads
  - Shellcode generators

⚠️ Exploitation Riskleri:
• System Stability:
  - Crash riski
  - Data corruption
  - Service disruption
  - Performance degradation

• Detection Risk:
  - IDS/IPS alarms
  - Log analysis
  - Behavior monitoring
  - Forensic analysis

pages.title: Metasploit Framework
pages.content:
Metasploit, sızma testi uzmanlarının en çok kullandığı exploitation framework'üdür.

🚀 Metasploit Bileşenleri:
• Exploits:
  - Bilinen güvenlik açıklarını kullanan kodlar
  - Platform-specific implementations
  - Reliability rankings
  - Target compatibility

• Payloads:
  - Exploit başarılı olduktan sonra çalışan kod
  - Meterpreter sessions
  - Reverse/bind shells
  - Custom payloads

• Auxiliary Modules:
  - Scanners ve fuzzers
  - Information gathering
  - DoS testing
  - Protocol testing

• Encoders:
  - Payload encoding
  - AV evasion
  - Character filtering
  - Format conversion

🔧 Metasploit Kullanımı:
• Temel Komutlar:
  - msfconsole: Ana interface
  - search: Exploit arama
  - use: Modül seçimi
  - set: Parameter belirleme
  - exploit: Saldırıyı başlatma

• Target Discovery:
  - db_nmap: Nmap integration
  - hosts: Host listesi
  - services: Service enumeration
  - vulns: Vulnerability tracking

• Session Management:
  - sessions -l: Aktif sessionlar
  - sessions -i: Session etkileşimi
  - background: Session arka plana
  - kill: Session sonlandırma

🎯 Meterpreter Shell:
• Advanced Features:
  - File system navigation
  - Process manipulation
  - Network pivoting
  - Screenshot capture
  - Keylogger functionality

• Post-Exploitation:
  - hashdump: Password hashes
  - getsystem: Privilege escalation
  - migrate: Process migration
  - portfwd: Port forwarding

🛠️ Metasploit Best Practices:
• Database Usage:
  - PostgreSQL backend
  - Workspace organization
  - Data persistence
  - Report generation

• Stealth Operations:
  - Payload encoding
  - Traffic encryption
  - Process injection
  - Memory-only payloads

pages.title: Quiz: Vulnerability Assessment ve Exploitation
pages.question: Metasploit Framework'ünde exploit başarılı olduktan sonra çalışan kod bileşenine ne denir?
pages.explanation: Payload, Metasploit Framework'ünde exploit başarılı olduktan sonra hedef sistemde çalışan kod bileşenidir. Meterpreter sessions, reverse shells ve diğer post-exploitation kodları payload kategorisine girer.

lessons.title: 4. Web Application Penetration Testing
lessons.description: Web uygulamalarını test et, OWASP Top 10 açıklarını keşfet ve güvenlik testleri yap.

pages.title: Web Application Penetration Testing Giriş
pages.content:
Web uygulama sızma testleri, web tabanlı sistemlerin güvenlik açıklarını tespit etmeye odaklanır.

🌐 Web Application Testing Kapsamı:
• Frontend güvenlik testleri
• Backend API testleri
• Database güvenlik değerlendirmesi
• Third-party integrations
• Mobile web interfaces
• Single Page Applications (SPA)

🎯 Test Amaçları:
• OWASP Top 10 açıklarını tespit etme
• Business logic flaws
• Input validation issues
• Authentication/Authorization flaws
• Session management problems
• Data exposure risks

📊 Web App Testing Methodologies:
• OWASP Testing Guide (WSTG):
  - 12 kategori, 91 test case
  - Sistematik yaklaşım
  - Risk-based prioritization
  - Detailed remediation guidance

• NIST SP 800-115:
  - Federal guidelines
  - Risk-based approach
  - Documentation standards
  - Compliance focus

🛠️ Test Araçları Kategorileri:
• Proxy Tools:
  - Burp Suite Professional
  - OWASP ZAP
  - Fiddler
  - Charles Proxy

• Automated Scanners:
  - Acunetix
  - Netsparker
  - AppScan
  - Veracode

pages.title: OWASP Top 10 ve Yaygın Web Açıkları
pages.content:
OWASP Top 10, web uygulamalarında en sık karşılaşılan güvenlik açıklarını listeler.

🔴 A01:2021 - Broken Access Control:
• Vertical privilege escalation
• Horizontal privilege escalation
• Direct object references
• Missing function level access control
• Metadata manipulation
• CORS misconfiguration

Test Teknikleri:
  - URL manipulation
  - Parameter tampering
  - Token manipulation
  - Role-based testing

🔴 A02:2021 - Cryptographic Failures:
• Weak encryption algorithms
• Hardcoded credentials
• Insecure key management
• Weak random number generation
• Missing encryption for sensitive data

Test Teknikleri:
  - Traffic analysis
  - Certificate validation
  - Crypto implementation review
  - Key strength analysis

🔴 A03:2021 - Injection:
• SQL Injection:
  - Union-based injection
  - Boolean-based blind
  - Time-based blind
  - Error-based injection

• NoSQL Injection
• Command Injection
• LDAP Injection
• XPath Injection

Test Teknikleri:
  - Automated payload injection
  - Manual crafted payloads
  - Blind injection techniques
  - Out-of-band exploitation

🔴 A04:2021 - Insecure Design:
• Insufficient threat modeling
• Insecure design patterns
• Missing security controls
• Business logic flaws

pages.title: SQL Injection Testing
pages.content:
SQL Injection, web uygulamalarında en yaygın ve tehlikeli güvenlik açıklarından biridir.

🎯 SQL Injection Türleri:
• In-band SQL Injection:
  - Union-based injection
  - Error-based injection
  - Direct output injection

• Blind SQL Injection:
  - Boolean-based blind
  - Time-based blind
  - Statistical analysis

• Out-of-band SQL Injection:
  - DNS exfiltration
  - HTTP requests
  - File system operations

🔍 Detection Techniques:
• Single Quote Testing:
  - Error message analysis
  - Response time analysis
  - Content length differences

• Boolean-based Testing:
  - True/false conditions
  - Response comparison
  - Logic-based inference

• Time-based Testing:
  - Sleep functions
  - Heavy queries
  - Response time measurement

⚔️ Exploitation Techniques:
• Database Enumeration:
  - Version identification
  - Schema discovery
  - Table/column enumeration
  - User privilege assessment

🛠️ SQL Injection Tools:
• SQLMap:
  - Automated detection
  - Multi-database support
  - Advanced exploitation
  - Tamper scripts

• Manual Testing:
  - Burp Suite Intruder
  - Custom payloads
  - Browser developer tools
  - Command line tools

pages.title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Testing
pages.content: Cross-Site Scripting, kullanıcı tarayıcılarında zararlı script çalıştırma açığıdır. 🎯 XSS Türleri: • Stored XSS (Persistent): - Veritabanında saklanır - Her erişimde çalışır - Yüksek impact - Geniş etki alanı - Blog yorumları, forum mesajları • Reflected XSS (Non-Persistent): - URL parametrelerinde - Form inputlarında - HTTP headers'da - Sosyal mühendislik gerekli - Tek seferlik etki • DOM-based XSS: - Client-side DOM manipulation - JavaScript execution context - Dynamic content generation - Advanced exploitation - Browser-side vulnerability 🔍 Detection Techniques: • Basic Payload Testing: - - - javascript:alert(1) -

pages.title: Quiz: Web Application Penetration Testing
pages.question: OWASP Top 10 2021'de en kritik web güvenlik açığı hangisidir?
pages.explanation: OWASP Top 10 2021 listesinde A01:2021 - Broken Access Control en kritik güvenlik açığı olarak yer almaktadır. Bu açık, kullanıcıların yetkilerini aşarak yetkisiz kaynaklara erişim sağlamasına neden olur.

lessons.title: 5. Network Penetration Testing
lessons.description: Ağ altyapısını test et, network güvenlik açıklarını tespit et ve ağ saldırılarını simüle et.

pages.title: Network Penetration Testing Temelleri
pages.content:
Network sızma testleri, ağ altyapısının güvenlik açıklarını tespit etmeye odaklanır.

🌐 Network Testing Kapsamı:
• External network testing
• Internal network testing
• Wireless network assessment
• Network device testing
• Network segmentation testing
• VPN security assessment

🎯 Test Amaçları:
• Network topology mapping
• Service enumeration
• Vulnerability identification
• Configuration assessment
• Access control testing
• Data flow analysis

📊 Network Testing Phases:
• Planning and Preparation:
  - Scope definition
  - Rules of engagement
  - Testing schedule
  - Resource allocation

• Information Gathering:
  - Network discovery
  - Port scanning
  - Service identification
  - OS fingerprinting

• Vulnerability Assessment:
  - Automated scanning
  - Manual verification
  - Configuration review
  - Risk assessment

• Exploitation:
  - Proof of concept
  - Impact demonstration
  - Lateral movement
  - Privilege escalation

🛠️ Network Testing Tools:
• Network Discovery:
  - Nmap
  - Masscan
  - Zmap
  - Angry IP Scanner

• Protocol Analysis:
  - Wireshark
  - tcpdump
  - Ettercap
  - NetworkMiner

• Vulnerability Scanners:
  - Nessus
  - OpenVAS
  - Qualys VMDR
  - Rapid7 Nexpose

pages.title: Network Discovery ve Port Scanning
pages.content:
Network keşfi ve port taraması, ağ sızma testinin temel aşamalarıdır.

🔍 Network Discovery Teknikleri:
• Host Discovery:
  - ICMP Echo Request (ping)
  - TCP SYN ping
  - TCP ACK ping
  - UDP ping
  - ARP ping (local network)

• Network Range Scanning:
  - Subnet scanning
  - CIDR block analysis
  - Network topology mapping
  - Gateway identification

⚡ Port Scanning Teknikleri:
• TCP Scanning:
  - TCP Connect scan (-sT)
  - TCP SYN scan (-sS)
  - TCP FIN scan (-sF)
  - TCP NULL scan (-sN)
  - TCP Xmas scan (-sX)
  - TCP ACK scan (-sA)
  - TCP Window scan (-sW)

• UDP Scanning:
  - UDP scan (-sU)
  - UDP service detection
  - ICMP unreachable analysis
  - DNS enumeration

🛠️ Nmap Advanced Techniques:
• Timing and Performance:
  - T0 (Paranoid) - T5 (Insane)
  - Custom timing controls
  - Packet rate limiting
  - Parallel host scanning

• Evasion Techniques:
  - Fragmented packets (-f)
  - Decoy scanning (-D)
  - Source port manipulation
  - MAC address spoofing
  - Idle scan (-sI)

• Service Detection:
  - Version detection (-sV)
  - OS fingerprinting (-O)
  - NSE script scanning (-sC)
  - Aggressive detection (-A)

📊 Scan Result Analysis:
• Port States:
  - Open: Service actively listening
  - Closed: Port accessible but no service
  - Filtered: Firewall/filter blocking
  - Unfiltered: Accessible but state unknown
  - Open/Filtered: Cannot determine state

• Output Formats:
  - Normal output (-oN)
  - XML output (-oX)
  - Grepable output (-oG)
  - All formats (-oA)

pages.title: Network Vulnerability Assessment
pages.content:
Network vulnerability assessment, ağ altyapısındaki güvenlik açıklarını sistematik olarak tespit eder.

🔍 Assessment Kapsamı:
• Network Infrastructure:
  - Router ve switch'ler
  - Firewall konfigürasyonları
  - Load balancer'lar
  - VPN gateway'ler
  - Network access control (NAC)

• Network Services:
  - DNS services
  - DHCP services
  - Mail services (SMTP, POP3, IMAP)
  - Web services (HTTP/HTTPS)
  - File services (FTP, SMB, NFS)
  - Directory services (LDAP, Active Directory)

🛠️ Vulnerability Scanning Tools:
• Network Scanners:
  - Nessus: Comprehensive vulnerability scanning
  - OpenVAS: Open source vulnerability assessment
  - Qualys VMDR: Cloud-based scanning
  - Rapid7 Nexpose: Enterprise vulnerability management
  - Nmap NSE: Scripted vulnerability detection

• Specialized Tools:
  - SSL/TLS: SSLScan, SSLyze, testssl.sh
  - SNMP: SNMPwalk, onesixtyone
  - DNS: DNSRecon, fierce, dnsmap
  - SMB: enum4linux, smbclient, CrackMapExec

📊 Vulnerability Categories:
• Configuration Issues:
  - Default credentials
  - Unnecessary services
  - Weak encryption settings
  - Missing security patches
  - Improper access controls

• Protocol Vulnerabilities:
  - SSL/TLS weaknesses
  - SNMP community strings
  - Weak authentication mechanisms
  - Unencrypted protocols

• Network Architecture Issues:
  - Network segmentation problems
  - DMZ misconfigurations
  - VLAN hopping possibilities
  - Routing table exposures

⚠️ Common Vulnerabilities:
• Missing Security Updates
• Weak SSL/TLS Configurations
• Default SNMP Community Strings
• Open Administrative Ports
• Unfiltered Network Traffic
• Weak Network Device Passwords
• Information Disclosure via Banners
• Unnecessary Network Services

📋 Assessment Methodology:
1. Network Discovery ve Mapping
2. Port ve Service Enumeration
3. Vulnerability Identification
4. Risk Assessment ve Prioritization
5. False Positive Elimination
6. Remediation Recommendations

pages.title: Wireless Network Testing
pages.content:
Wireless network testing, kablosuz ağ altyapısının güvenlik açıklarını değerlendirir.

📶 Wireless Security Protocols:
• WEP (Wired Equivalent Privacy):
  - Deprecated ve güvensiz
  - 64-bit ve 128-bit keys
  - RC4 stream cipher
  - IV collision attacks
  - Easily crackable

• WPA/WPA2 (Wi-Fi Protected Access):
  - TKIP (WPA) ve AES (WPA2)
  - PSK (Personal) ve Enterprise modes
  - 4-way handshake
  - Dictionary attacks possible
  - WPS vulnerabilities

• WPA3 (Latest Standard):
  - Enhanced security
  - SAE (Simultaneous Authentication of Equals)
  - Forward secrecy
  - Protection against offline attacks

🔍 Wireless Testing Phases:
• Reconnaissance:
  - Access point discovery
  - Channel analysis
  - SSID enumeration
  - Client device identification
  - Signal strength measurement

• Traffic Analysis:
  - Packet capture
  - Protocol analysis
  - Handshake capture
  - Data exfiltration
  - Management frame analysis

🛠️ Wireless Testing Tools:
• Discovery Tools:
  - Airodump-ng: Network discovery
  - Kismet: Wireless detector
  - inSSIDer: WiFi analyzer
  - WiFi Explorer: macOS tool

• Attack Tools:
  - Aircrack-ng: WEP/WPA cracking
  - Hashcat: Advanced password cracking
  - John the Ripper: Password cracking
  - Reaver: WPS attack tool
  - Bully: WPS brute force

• Packet Analysis:
  - Wireshark: Network protocol analyzer
  - tshark: Command-line Wireshark
  - tcpdump: Packet capture
  - NetworkMiner: Network forensics

⚔️ Wireless Attack Techniques:
• WEP Cracking:
  - IV collision attacks
  - Statistical attacks
  - Packet injection
  - Fast cracking methods

• WPA/WPA2 Attacks:
  - Dictionary attacks
  - Brute force attacks
  - Evil twin attacks
  - Deauthentication attacks
  - PMKID attacks

• WPS Attacks:
  - PIN brute forcing
  - Pixie dust attack
  - Offline PIN attacks
  - Implementation flaws

pages.title: Quiz: Network Penetration Testing
pages.question: Nmap'te TCP SYN scan yapmak için hangi parametre kullanılır?
pages.explanation: Nmap'te TCP SYN scan yapmak için -sS parametresi kullanılır. Bu stealth scan olarak da bilinir çünkü tam TCP bağlantısı kurulmaz, sadece SYN paketi gönderilir.

lessons.title: 6. Post-Exploitation ve Persistence
lessons.description: Sistem erişimini sürdür, lateral movement yap ve persistence tekniklerini öğren.

pages.title: Post-Exploitation Temelleri
pages.content:
Post-exploitation, sistem erişimi sağlandıktan sonraki faaliyetleri kapsar.

🎯 Post-Exploitation Amaçları:
• Sistem keşfi ve enumeration
• Privilege escalation
• Lateral movement
• Data collection ve exfiltration
• Persistence establishment
• Impact assessment
• Evidence collection

📊 System Enumeration:
• Operating System Information:
  - OS version ve build
  - Architecture (x86/x64)
  - Installed software listesi
  - Running processes
  - System services
  - Patch level assessment

• Network Information:
  - IP configuration
  - Routing tables
  - Active network connections
  - Firewall configuration
  - Network shares
  - VPN connections

• User Information:
  - Current user context
  - User privileges
  - Local users ve groups
  - Domain membership
  - Login history
  - Password policies

🔍 Information Gathering Tools:
• Windows Commands:
  - whoami /all
  - systeminfo
  - net user
  - net localgroup
  - ipconfig /all
  - route print
  - netstat -ano
  - tasklist /svc

• Linux Commands:
  - id
  - uname -a
  - ps aux
  - netstat -tulpn
  - cat /etc/passwd
  - cat /etc/group
  - ifconfig -a
  - route -n

• PowerShell Commands:
  - Get-ComputerInfo
  - Get-Process
  - Get-Service
  - Get-NetIPConfiguration
  - Get-LocalUser
  - Get-LocalGroup

pages.title: Privilege Escalation Teknikleri
pages.content:
Privilege escalation, düşük yetkili erişimden yüksek yetkili erişime geçiş sürecidir.

⬆️ Windows Privilege Escalation:
• Token Manipulation:
  - Token impersonation
  - Token duplication
  - SeImpersonatePrivilege abuse
  - SeDebugPrivilege exploitation

• Service Exploitation:
  - Unquoted service paths
  - Weak service permissions
  - Service binary hijacking
  - DLL hijacking

• Registry Exploitation:
  - AlwaysInstallElevated
  - AutoRun programs
  - Registry key permissions
  - Stored credentials

• UAC Bypass:
  - UAC bypass techniques
  - High integrity processes
  - COM interface exploitation
  - DLL injection

🐧 Linux Privilege Escalation:
• SUID/SGID Binaries:
  - find / -perm -u=s 2>/dev/null
  - SUID binary exploitation
  - Custom SUID programs
  - GTFOBins techniques

• Kernel Exploits:
  - Kernel version identification
  - Known kernel vulnerabilities
  - Local privilege escalation exploits
  - Dirty COW, Dirty Pipe gibi

• Sudo Misconfigurations:
  - sudo -l enumeration
  - NOPASSWD entries
  - Wildcards in sudo rules
  - Environment variables

• Cron Jobs:
  - Writable cron jobs
  - PATH manipulation
  - Wildcard injections
  - Script modifications

🛠️ Privilege Escalation Tools:
• Windows Tools:
  - WinPEAS
  - PowerUp
  - PrivescCheck
  - Watson
  - SharpUp

• Linux Tools:
  - LinPEAS
  - LinEnum
  - Linux Exploit Suggester
  - Unix-privesc-check
  - GTFOBins

pages.title: Lateral Movement Teknikleri
pages.content:
Lateral movement, bir sistemden diğerine geçerek ağ içinde hareket etme sürecidir.

🔄 Lateral Movement Amaçları:
• Network keşfi ve mapping
• Additional system compromise
• Privilege escalation
• Critical asset identification
• Domain controller erişimi
• Data discovery ve access

🎯 Movement Techniques:
• Credential Harvesting:
  - Memory credential extraction
  - Registry credential mining
  - Browser password extraction
  - Cached credential abuse
  - LSA secrets extraction

• Pass-the-Hash Attacks:
  - NTLM hash usage without cracking
  - Authentication with hash values
  - Psexec with hash authentication
  - WMI execution with credentials
  - SMB share access

• Kerberos Attacks:
  - Golden ticket attacks
  - Silver ticket attacks
  - Kerberoasting
  - ASREPRoasting
  - Ticket passing

🛠️ Lateral Movement Tools:
• Windows Tools:
  - PsExec: Remote command execution
  - WMI: Windows Management Instrumentation
  - PowerShell Remoting
  - RDP (Remote Desktop Protocol)
  - WinRM (Windows Remote Management)

• Post-Exploitation Frameworks:
  - Cobalt Strike: Advanced threat emulation
  - Empire: PowerShell post-exploitation
  - Metasploit: Multi-exploit framework
  - BloodHound: AD attack path analysis

• Credential Tools:
  - Mimikatz: Credential extraction
  - LaZagne: Multi-platform passwords
  - Hashcat: Advanced cracking
  - John the Ripper: Password cracking

🌐 Network Pivoting:
• Port Forwarding:
  - Local port forwarding
  - Remote port forwarding
  - Dynamic port forwarding
  - SSH tunneling

• SOCKS Proxy:
  - SOCKS4/SOCKS5 setup
  - Proxy chain creation
  - Traffic routing
  - Multi-hop pivoting

• DNS Tunneling:
  - DNS exfiltration channels
  - Command and control
  - Firewall bypass
  - Covert channels

⚠️ Detection Evasion:
• Living off the Land:
  - Built-in Windows tools
  - PowerShell obfuscation
  - WMI event subscriptions
  - Scheduled task abuse

• Anti-Forensics:
  - Log cleaning
  - Timestamp manipulation
  - Process injection
  - Memory-only payloads

pages.title: Data Exfiltration ve Persistence
pages.content:
Data exfiltration ve persistence, saldırının kalıcılığını ve veri çalma sürecini kapsar.

📁 Data Exfiltration:
• Data Discovery:
  - File system enumeration
  - Database discovery
  - Email system access
  - Cloud storage identification
  - Network share exploration
  - Application data stores

• Data Classification:
  - Sensitive data identification
  - Personal information (PII)
  - Financial data
  - Intellectual property
  - Business secrets
  - Customer databases

• Exfiltration Methods:
  - HTTP/HTTPS channels
  - DNS tunneling
  - ICMP tunneling
  - FTP/SFTP transfers
  - Email attachments
  - Cloud storage uploads
  - USB device copying

🛠️ Exfiltration Tools:
• Network Tools:
  - Netcat: Network Swiss Army knife
  - Socat: Advanced networking tool
  - Wget/cURL: HTTP transfers
  - SCP/SFTP: Secure file transfer

• Covert Channels:
  - DNSExfiltrator: DNS-based data theft
  - ICMP tunneling tools
  - Steganography tools
  - Base64 encoding utilities

🔒 Persistence Techniques:
• Windows Persistence:
  - Registry run keys
  - Scheduled tasks
  - Service installation
  - WMI event subscriptions
  - DLL hijacking
  - COM hijacking
  - Startup folder entries

• Linux Persistence:
  - Cron jobs
  - Init scripts (/etc/init.d/)
  - Systemd services
  - SSH key installation
  - .bashrc modifications
  - Library preloading (LD_PRELOAD)
  - Kernel module insertion

• Advanced Persistence:
  - BIOS/UEFI rootkits
  - Hypervisor-level persistence
  - Application backdoors
  - Configuration file modifications
  - Database triggers

🛡️ Anti-Forensics Techniques:
• Log Manipulation:
  - Windows Event Log clearing
  - Linux log file deletion
  - Log rotation manipulation
  - Selective log entry removal

• Artifact Cleanup:
  - Temporary file removal
  - Browser history cleaning
  - Recent document clearing
  - Registry cleanup
  - Memory dumps clearing

• Stealth Operations:
  - Process name spoofing
  - Service masquerading
  - File attribute manipulation
  - Timestamp modification
  - Hidden file creation

pages.title: Quiz: Post-Exploitation ve Persistence
pages.question: Windows'ta SUID benzeri yetki yükseltme için hangi privilege kullanılır?
pages.explanation: SeImpersonatePrivilege, Windows'ta token impersonation yaparak yetki yükseltmesi sağlar. Bu privilege özellikle service account'larda bulunur ve JuicyPotato, PrintSpoofer gibi araçlarla exploit edilebilir.

lessons.title: 7. Social Engineering ve Physical Security Testing
lessons.description: Sosyal mühendislik testleri yap, fiziksel güvenlik açıklarını tespit et.

pages.title: Social Engineering Testing Temelleri
pages.content:
Social engineering, insanların güvenlik zafiyetlerini kullanarak bilgi ve erişim elde etme sanatıdır.

🎭 Social Engineering Türleri:
• Phishing Attacks:
  - Email phishing
  - Spear phishing
  - Whaling (CEO phishing)
  - SMS phishing (smishing)
  - Voice phishing (vishing)

• Pretexting:
  - False identity creation
  - Authority impersonation
  - Trust building scenarios
  - Information elicitation

• Baiting:
  - USB drop attacks
  - Malicious downloads
  - Physical media traps
  - Curiosity exploitation

• Tailgating/Piggybacking:
  - Physical access following
  - Badge sharing
  - Door holding exploitation
  - Courtesy abuse

📊 Testing Metodolojileri:
• Open Source Intelligence (OSINT):
  - Target research
  - Employee enumeration
  - Organization structure
  - Public information gathering
  - Social media analysis

• Pretext Development:
  - Scenario creation
  - Character development
  - Story consistency
  - Credibility building

• Attack Vector Selection:
  - Email campaigns
  - Phone calls
  - Physical visits
  - Social media approaches

🛠️ Social Engineering Tools:
• Email Testing:
  - GoPhish
  - King Phisher
  - Social-Engineer Toolkit (SET)
  - Lucy Security

• SMS/Voice Testing:
  - SpoofCard
  - Asterisk PBX
  - FreePBX
  - Custom scripts

• Information Gathering:
  - theHarvester
  - Maltego
  - Recon-ng
  - SpiderFoot
  - Sherlock

pages.title: Physical Security Testing
pages.content:
Physical security testing, organizasyonların fiziksel güvenlik kontrollerini değerlendirir.

🏢 Physical Security Assessment:
• Perimeter Security:
  - Fence ve barrier analysis
  - Gate ve entry point security
  - Lighting assessment
  - Motion sensors detection
  - CCTV coverage analysis
  - Alarm system evaluation

• Building Security:
  - Entry/exit point mapping
  - Badge access systems
  - Visitor management procedures
  - Security guard protocols
  - Elevator security controls
  - Emergency exit procedures

• Office Security:
  - Desk security (clean desk policy)
  - Computer screen locks
  - Document storage security
  - USB port controls
  - Network outlet accessibility
  - Server room physical security

🔍 Physical Testing Techniques:
• Tailgating/Piggybacking:
  - Following authorized personnel
  - Badge sharing exploitation
  - Courtesy door holding
  - Delivery person impersonation
  - Maintenance worker disguise

• Lock Picking:
  - Pin tumbler locks
  - Wafer locks
  - Disc detainer locks
  - Electronic locks
  - Master key systems
  - Lock bumping techniques

• Badge Cloning:
  - RFID card analysis
  - Magnetic stripe duplication
  - Proximity card cloning
  - Smart card attacks
  - Badge reader exploitation

🛠️ Physical Security Tools:
• Lock Picking Tools:
  - Pick sets
  - Tension wrenches
  - Bump keys
  - Electronic pick guns
  - Bypass tools

• RFID/Badge Tools:
  - Proxmark3: RFID research tool
  - Chameleon Mini: RFID emulator
  - RFID readers/writers
  - Card cloning devices
  - Badge duplication tools

• Surveillance Tools:
  - Hidden cameras
  - Audio recording devices
  - Network packet capture
  - WiFi pineapple
  - Bluetooth sniffing

📊 Information Gathering:
• Reconnaissance Methods:
  - Google Earth analysis
  - Street view examination
  - Social media location tags
  - Employee movement patterns
  - Business hour observations
  - Delivery schedules

• Dumpster Diving:
  - Document disposal analysis
  - Hardware disposal review
  - Password recovery attempts
  - Network diagram discoveries
  - Employee information gathering

⚖️ Legal ve Ethical Considerations:
• Legal Activities:
  - Public area observation
  - Authorized access testing
  - Documented permission
  - Safety protocols

• Prohibited Activities:
  - Trespassing
  - Property damage
  - Theft or removal
  - Privacy violations
  - Safety hazard creation

pages.title: Advanced Social Engineering Campaigns
pages.content:
Advanced social engineering, sofistike psikolojik manipülasyon teknikleri kullanır.

🎭 Advanced Campaign Types:
• Business Email Compromise (BEC):
  - CEO fraud attacks
  - Invoice manipulation
  - Wire transfer fraud
  - Account takeover
  - Vendor email compromise

• Spear Phishing Campaigns:
  - Highly targeted emails
  - Personalized content
  - Executive impersonation
  - Contextual relevance
  - Multi-stage attacks

• Water Hole Attacks:
  - Website compromise
  - Targeted audience
  - Drive-by downloads
  - Supply chain attacks
  - Industry-specific sites

📱 Multi-Channel Attacks:
• Omnichannel Approaches:
  - Email + phone combination
  - SMS + social media
  - Physical + digital integration
  - Multi-touchpoint campaigns
  - Cross-platform consistency

• Technology Integration:
  - Deepfake voice calls
  - AI-generated content
  - Automated response systems
  - Machine learning targeting
  - Behavioral analysis

🧠 Psychological Manipulation:
• Authority Principle:
  - Executive impersonation
  - Government agency spoofing
  - Expert opinion abuse
  - Official document forgery
  - Uniform/badge exploitation

• Urgency and Scarcity:
  - Time-limited offers
  - Emergency scenarios
  - Limited availability
  - Deadline pressure
  - Crisis situations

• Social Proof:
  - Peer pressure tactics
  - Fake testimonials
  - Group conformity
  - Bandwagon effect
  - FOMO (Fear of Missing Out)

🛠️ Campaign Management Tools:
• Email Platforms:
  - GoPhish: Open source phishing
  - King Phisher: Social engineering toolkit
  - Lucy Security: Awareness training
  - MailSniper: Email reconnaissance

• Infrastructure Tools:
  - Domain fronting
  - CDN abuse
  - SSL certificate spoofing
  - URL shortening services
  - Redirector services

📊 Campaign Metrics:
• Success Indicators:
  - Email open rates
  - Link click rates
  - Credential submission
  - Attachment downloads
  - Phone callback rates

• Behavioral Analysis:
  - Response time patterns
  - Device/browser analysis
  - Geographic distribution
  - Department vulnerability
  - Role-based targeting

🛡️ Defense Evasion:
• Email Security Bypass:
  - SPF/DKIM/DMARC evasion
  - Content filtering bypass
  - Sandbox evasion
  - URL reputation bypass
  - Attachment obfuscation

pages.title: Security Awareness ve Defense
pages.content:
Security awareness, sosyal mühendislik saldırılarına karşı savunma stratejileri geliştirir.

🛡️ Defense Strategies:
• Technical Controls:
  - Email security gateways
  - Advanced threat protection
  - URL filtering systems
  - Endpoint detection response (EDR)
  - Multi-factor authentication
  - Zero-trust architecture

• Process Controls:
  - Verification procedures
  - Escalation protocols
  - Incident response plans
  - Change management
  - Access control policies
  - Document classification

📚 Awareness Training:
• Training Components:
  - Phishing recognition
  - Social engineering tactics
  - Password security
  - Physical security awareness
  - Incident reporting procedures
  - Policy compliance

• Training Methods:
  - Interactive workshops
  - Simulated phishing campaigns
  - Computer-based training
  - Lunch and learn sessions
  - Security newsletters
  - Awareness posters

• Training Metrics:
  - Completion rates
  - Knowledge retention
  - Behavior change
  - Incident reduction
  - Reporting increases
  - Policy adherence

🚨 Incident Response:
• Incident Categories:
  - Successful phishing
  - Credential compromise
  - Data exfiltration
  - System compromise
  - Physical security breach

• Response Procedures:
  - Immediate containment
  - Threat assessment
  - Communication protocols
  - Evidence preservation
  - Recovery procedures
  - Lessons learned

📊 Awareness Program Management:
• Program Development:
  - Baseline assessment
  - Risk-based training
  - Role-specific content
  - Regular updates
  - Continuous improvement

• Effectiveness Measurement:
  - Simulated attack results
  - Behavioral observations
  - Self-assessment surveys
  - Incident trend analysis
  - Compliance audits

🎯 Targeted Training:
• High-Risk Groups:
  - Executive management
  - Finance department
  - HR personnel
  - IT administrators
  - Customer service

• Customized Content:
  - Industry-specific scenarios
  - Role-based examples
  - Local threat landscape
  - Regulatory requirements
  - Cultural considerations

🔄 Continuous Improvement:
• Program Evolution:
  - Threat landscape updates
  - Technology adaptations
  - Feedback integration
  - Best practice adoption
  - Vendor partnerships

• Success Indicators:
  - Reduced successful attacks
  - Increased reporting
  - Faster incident detection
  - Better risk decisions
  - Cultural change

pages.title: Quiz: Social Engineering ve Physical Security Testing
pages.question: CEO'ları hedef alan özel phishing saldırısına ne denir?
pages.explanation: Whaling, CEO ve üst düzey yöneticileri hedef alan özel phishing saldırılarına verilen isimdir. Bu saldırılar genellikle yüksek değerli hedefler olduğu için 'balina avı' olarak adlandırılır.

lessons.title: 8. Sızma Testi Raporlama ve Sunum
lessons.description: Profesyonel sızma testi raporları hazırla, sunum tekniklerini öğren ve müşteri iletişimi yap.

pages.title: Penetration Test Raporlama
pages.content:
Sızma testi raporu, test sürecinin en kritik çıktısıdır ve tüm bulguları kapsamlı şekilde dokumenter.

📋 Rapor Yapısı:
• Executive Summary:
  - Yönetici özeti
  - Test kapsamı ve hedefleri
  - Ana bulgular özeti
  - Risk değerlendirmesi
  - Acil aksiyon önerileri
  - Genel güvenlik durumu

• Technical Summary:
  - Metodoloji açıklaması
  - Test prosedürleri
  - Kullanılan araçlar
  - Test sınırları
  - Assumptions ve kısıtlar

• Detailed Findings:
  - Vulnerability detayları
  - Risk seviyesi (Critical/High/Medium/Low)
  - CVSS skorları
  - Proof of concept
  - Impact analizi
  - Remediation önerileri

🎯 Executive Summary İçeriği:
• Business Impact Focus:
  - İş süreçlerine etki
  - Financial risk assessment
  - Reputation risk
  - Compliance implications
  - Strategic recommendations

• Risk Matrix:
  - Likelihood vs Impact
  - Risk prioritization
  - Risk appetite alignment
  - Business context

🔍 Technical Findings Format:
• Vulnerability Title
• Risk Rating (Critical/High/Medium/Low/Info)
• CVSS v3.1 Score
• CWE/CVE References
• Affected Systems/Components
• Description
• Impact Assessment
• Proof of Concept
• Remediation Steps
• References

📊 Risk Assessment Kriterleri:
• Likelihood Factors:
  - Exploit availability
  - Attack complexity
  - Access requirements
  - Detection difficulty

• Impact Factors:
  - Data confidentiality
  - System availability
  - Data integrity
  - Business operations
  - Compliance violations

pages.title: Report Writing Best Practices
pages.content:
Profesyonel raporlama, sızma testi bulgularının etkili bir şekilde iletilmesini sağlar.

📝 Writing Guidelines:
• Language ve Style:
  - Clear ve concise writing
  - Technical jargon minimization
  - Active voice usage
  - Professional tone
  - Consistent terminology
  - Grammar ve spell checking

• Structure ve Flow:
  - Logical information progression
  - Executive summary first
  - Technical details follow
  - Consistent formatting
  - Clear section headers
  - Table of contents

• Visual Elements:
  - Screenshots ve evidence
  - Network diagrams
  - Risk matrices
  - Charts ve graphs
  - Code snippets
  - Proof of concept images

🎯 Audience Considerations:
• Executive Audience:
  - Business impact focus
  - High-level summaries
  - Financial implications
  - Strategic recommendations
  - Timeline expectations
  - Resource requirements

• Technical Audience:
  - Detailed vulnerability descriptions
  - Step-by-step reproduction
  - Technical remediation steps
  - Code examples
  - Configuration recommendations
  - Testing methodologies

• Management Audience:
  - Risk prioritization
  - Resource allocation needs
  - Implementation timelines
  - Process improvements
  - Policy recommendations
  - Training requirements

📊 Evidence Documentation:
• Screenshot Guidelines:
  - High resolution images
  - Clear annotations
  - Sensitive data redaction
  - Timestamp inclusion
  - Context provision
  - Professional presentation

• Code ve Command Evidence:
  - Syntax highlighting
  - Input/output separation
  - Command explanations
  - Error message inclusion
  - Environment details
  - Safety warnings

🔒 Confidentiality ve Security:
• Information Handling:
  - Data classification
  - Sensitive information redaction
  - Secure document storage
  - Access controls
  - Retention policies
  - Disposal procedures

• Legal Considerations:
  - Client confidentiality
  - Non-disclosure agreements
  - Evidence preservation
  - Regulatory compliance
  - Liability limitations
  - Professional standards

📋 Quality Assurance:
• Review Process:
  - Peer review
  - Technical accuracy check
  - Grammar ve style review
  - Client name verification
  - Evidence validation
  - Final approval process

• Common Mistakes:
  - Incomplete evidence
  - Technical inaccuracies
  - Poor risk assessment
  - Missing recommendations
  - Inconsistent formatting
  - Confidentiality breaches

pages.title: Client Communication ve Presentation
pages.content:
Etkili müşteri iletişimi, test bulgularının kabul edilmesi ve uygulanması için kritiktir.

🗣️ Communication Strategies:
• Pre-Test Communication:
  - Expectation setting
  - Scope clarification
  - Timeline confirmation
  - Contact procedures
  - Emergency protocols
  - Progress reporting

• During-Test Updates:
  - Critical finding alerts
  - Progress milestones
  - Scope adjustments
  - Issue resolution
  - Timeline updates
  - Status meetings

• Post-Test Delivery:
  - Report presentation
  - Finding explanations
  - Remediation guidance
  - Follow-up planning
  - Question handling
  - Support availability

📊 Presentation Techniques:
• Executive Presentations:
  - High-level overview
  - Business risk focus
  - Visual dashboards
  - Key metrics highlighting
  - Action plan emphasis
  - Time-boxed delivery

• Technical Deep Dives:
  - Detailed findings review
  - Proof of concept demos
  - Technical Q&A sessions
  - Remediation workshops
  - Tool demonstrations
  - Best practices sharing

• Mixed Audience Sessions:
  - Layered information delivery
  - Role-based breakouts
  - Interactive discussions
  - Collaborative planning
  - Consensus building
  - Action item assignment

🎯 Meeting Management:
• Preparation:
  - Agenda creation
  - Attendee identification
  - Material preparation
  - Technology testing
  - Backup plans
  - Time allocation

• Facilitation:
  - Meeting objectives
  - Time management
  - Participation encouragement
  - Note taking
  - Action item tracking
  - Follow-up scheduling

💡 Difficult Conversations:
• Resistance Management:
  - Finding disputes
  - Priority disagreements
  - Resource constraints
  - Timeline pressures
  - Compliance conflicts
  - Technical debates

• Conflict Resolution:
  - Active listening
  - Evidence-based arguments
  - Compromise solutions
  - Escalation procedures
  - Documentation requirements
  - Relationship preservation

📞 Communication Channels:
• Formal Channels:
  - Written reports
  - Official presentations
  - Email communications
  - Meeting minutes
  - Project status updates
  - Contract modifications

• Informal Channels:
  - Phone conversations
  - Instant messaging
  - Hallway discussions
  - Coffee meetings
  - Social interactions
  - Professional networks

🔄 Follow-up ve Support:
• Post-Delivery Support:
  - Question answering
  - Clarification requests
  - Implementation guidance
  - Tool recommendations
  - Vendor introductions
  - Training provision

• Long-term Relationships:
  - Regular check-ins
  - Industry updates
  - Best practice sharing
  - Referral opportunities
  - Continuous improvement
  - Partnership development

pages.title: Executive Dashboard ve Metrics
pages.content:
Executive dashboard'lar, üst yönetim için görsel ve anlaşılır risk sunumu sağlar.

📊 Dashboard Components:
• Risk Overview:
  - Overall risk score
  - Risk trend analysis
  - Category breakdown
  - Severity distribution
  - Impact assessment
  - Compliance status

• Key Performance Indicators:
  - Critical findings count
  - Average resolution time
  - Remediation progress
  - Cost avoidance
  - Security posture improvement
  - Benchmark comparisons

• Visual Elements:
  - Traffic light systems
  - Risk heat maps
  - Progress bars
  - Trend charts
  - Pie charts
  - Comparative graphs

📈 Metrics ve Measurements:
• Vulnerability Metrics:
  - Total vulnerability count
  - Severity distribution
  - Age of vulnerabilities
  - Recurrence rates
  - False positive rates
  - Time to discovery

• Remediation Metrics:
  - Mean time to remediation
  - Resolution rates by priority
  - Remediation effectiveness
  - Cost per fix
  - Resource utilization
  - SLA compliance

• Business Impact Metrics:
  - Potential financial loss
  - Reputation risk score
  - Compliance violation risk
  - Operational disruption potential
  - Customer impact assessment
  - Regulatory penalty exposure

🎯 Executive Reporting:
• Strategic Recommendations:
  - Security investment priorities
  - Resource allocation guidance
  - Technology roadmap alignment
  - Policy enhancement needs
  - Training program requirements
  - Vendor relationship management

• Risk Communication:
  - Business context provision
  - Industry comparisons
  - Regulatory implications
  - Competitive advantages
  - Market positioning
  - Stakeholder considerations

🔍 Benchmarking ve Comparisons:
• Industry Standards:
  - Peer organization comparisons
  - Industry average baselines
  - Best practice alignment
  - Maturity model positioning
  - Regulatory compliance levels
  - Framework adherence

• Historical Trends:
  - Year-over-year improvements
  - Quarterly progress tracking
  - Seasonal variations
  - Incident correlation
  - Investment ROI measurement
  - Program effectiveness

🛡️ Strategic Planning:
• Risk Appetite Alignment:
  - Acceptable risk levels
  - Risk tolerance boundaries
  - Business objective alignment
  - Competitive positioning
  - Market requirements
  - Stakeholder expectations

• Investment Justification:
  - Cost-benefit analysis
  - ROI calculations
  - Risk reduction quantification
  - Business case development
  - Budget allocation guidance
  - Priority ranking systems

pages.title: Quiz: Sızma Testi Raporlama ve Sunum
pages.question: Sızma testi raporunun hangi bölümü yöneticiler için hazırlanır?
pages.explanation: Executive Summary, üst düzey yöneticiler için hazırlanan bölümdür. Bu bölümde teknik detaylara girilmez, iş etkisi ve strateik öneriler üzerine odaklanılır.

lessons.title: 9. Kapsamlı Test: Sızma Testi (Penetration Testing)
lessons.description: Sızma Testi kategorisindeki tüm konulardan kapsamlı quiz testi. 10 soru ile bilgilerinizi test edin.

pages.title: Sızma Testi Kapsamlı Testi
pages.content: Bu kapsamlı test, Sızma Testi (Penetration Testing) kategorisinde öğrendiğiniz tüm konuları kapsar. Test sızma testi metodolojileri, reconnaissance teknikleri, vulnerability assessment, exploitation, web application testing, network testing, post-exploitation, social engineering ve raporlama konularından 10 soru içermektedir.

pages.title: Test Kuralları
pages.content: Test 10 sorudan oluşmaktadır. Her soru için sadece bir doğru cevap vardır. Test kategorisindeki tüm konuları kapsamaktadır. Testi tamamladıktan sonra sonuçlarınızı görebilir ve eksik konularınızı tekrar çalışabilirsiniz.

pages.title: Kategori Tamamlama
pages.content: Bu testi başarıyla tamamladığınızda, Sızma Testi (Penetration Testing) kategorisini tamamlamış olacaksınız. Test sonucunuz %70 ve üzerinde olmalıdır.

pages.title: Soru 1: Sızma Testi Metodolojileri
pages.content: [Quiz Sayfası: Soru 1: Sızma Testi Metodolojileri]
pages.question: PTES metodolojisinin kaç aşaması vardır?
pages.explanation: PTES (Penetration Testing Execution Standard) metodolojisi 7 ana aşamadan oluşur: Pre-engagement, Intelligence Gathering, Threat Modeling, Vulnerability Assessment, Exploitation, Post Exploitation ve Reporting.

pages.title: Soru 2: Reconnaissance Teknikleri
pages.content: [Quiz Sayfası: Soru 2: Reconnaissance Teknikleri]
pages.question: Passive reconnaissance'ın temel avantajı nedir?
pages.explanation: Passive reconnaissance'ın en büyük avantajı, hedef sistemle doğrudan temas kurulmadığı için tespit edilme riskinin minimum olmasıdır.

pages.title: Soru 3: Vulnerability Assessment
pages.content: [Quiz Sayfası: Soru 3: Vulnerability Assessment]
pages.question: Hangi araç SQL injection testleri için özel olarak tasarlanmıştır?
pages.explanation: SQLMap, SQL injection açıklarını tespit etmek ve sömürmek için özel olarak tasarlanmış otomatik bir araçtır.

pages.title: Soru 4: OWASP Top 10
pages.content: [Quiz Sayfası: Soru 4: OWASP Top 10]
pages.question: OWASP Top 10 2021'de en kritik web güvenlik açığı hangisidir?
pages.explanation: OWASP Top 10 2021 listesinde A01:2021 - Broken Access Control en kritik güvenlik açığı olarak yer almaktadır.

pages.title: Soru 5: Network Penetration Testing
pages.content: [Quiz Sayfası: Soru 5: Network Penetration Testing]
pages.question: Nmap'te TCP SYN scan yapmak için hangi parametre kullanılır?
pages.explanation: Nmap'te TCP SYN scan yapmak için -sS parametresi kullanılır. Bu stealth scan olarak da bilinir.

pages.title: Soru 6: Metasploit Framework
pages.content: [Quiz Sayfası: Soru 6: Metasploit Framework]
pages.question: Metasploit Framework'ünde exploit başarılı olduktan sonra çalışan kod bileşenine ne denir?
pages.explanation: Payload, Metasploit Framework'ünde exploit başarılı olduktan sonra hedef sistemde çalışan kod bileşenidir.

pages.title: Soru 7: Privilege Escalation
pages.content: [Quiz Sayfası: Soru 7: Privilege Escalation]
pages.question: Windows'ta SUID benzeri yetki yükseltme için hangi privilege kullanılır?
pages.explanation: SeImpersonatePrivilege, Windows'ta token impersonation yaparak yetki yükseltmesi sağlar.

pages.title: Soru 8: Social Engineering
pages.content: [Quiz Sayfası: Soru 8: Social Engineering]
pages.question: CEO'ları hedef alan özel phishing saldırısına ne denir?
pages.explanation: Whaling, CEO ve üst düzey yöneticileri hedef alan özel phishing saldırılarına verilen isimdir.

pages.title: Soru 9: Wireless Security
pages.content: [Quiz Sayfası: Soru 9: Wireless Security]
pages.question: WEP protokolünün ana zayıflığı nedir?
pages.explanation: WEP protokolü IV (Initialization Vector) collision saldırılarına açık olduğu için kolayca kırılabilir.

pages.title: Soru 10: Penetration Test Raporlama
pages.content: [Quiz Sayfası: Soru 10: Penetration Test Raporlama]
pages.question: Sızma testi raporunun hangi bölümü yöneticiler için hazırlanır?
pages.explanation: Executive Summary, üst düzey yöneticiler için hazırlanan bölümdür. Bu bölümde teknik detaylara girilmez, iş etkisi ve stratejik öneriler üzerine odaklanılır.
